TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: University of Massachusetts: Dartmouth CWGS Campus Saftey
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: Our goal is to help end campus sexual assault, by educating students. Unfortunately, sexual assault does still occur, This app provides resources & information to direct victims to the right place.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: We want to help keep you out of harm's way. Having this app in your arsenal lets you eradicate the fears of going out & enjoying our fine campus.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: We have provided answers to common questions regarding sexual assault to educate yourself. We want to assure any victims that help of all kinds is nearby, and direct you to those resources. Too often a victim feels trapped & alone, we are here to help, even if it feels minor.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE4_DESCRIPTION: We want to make our campus a comfortable, safe, and fun place to be. Knowing that you're safe keeps your mind at peace.

JUST_ASSAULTED_SLIDE3_TITLE: Recieve confidential, free, counseling from our on campus title IX coordinator
